com.complexible.stardog.api.impl
Class AbstractQuery<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.complexible.stardog.api.impl.AbstractQuery<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractReadQuery
public abstract class AbstractQuery<T>
extends Object
implements Query<T>

Base implementation of the Query interface which provides implementations for all the setParameter methods for the parameterized query. Concrete implementations of this class are required to implement the protocol specific query dispatch.

Since:
0.3
Version:
2.0.2
Author:
Michael Grove

dataset

public Query<T> dataset(Dataset theDataset)
Description copied from interface: Query
Specify the dataset this query will be executed against. This defines the active graph for the query and will override anything specified within the query. Use Datasets.NO_DATASET

Specified by:
dataset in interface Query<T>
Parameters:
theDataset - the active graph dataset
Returns:
this query
See Also:
Datasets, ImmutableDataset
